name: Dye Water 3D - Perfect Of Sort
description:
HOW TO PLAY:
- Choose the water pipe
- Pour into tubes of the same color
- Color puzzle, then pour water, then choose which glass to pour water into another.
The rule is you can only fill with water if it is bonded with the same color and there is enough space on the glass.
- Try not to get stuck - but don't worry, you can always start the level over at any time by recharging and replaying the game.
